1230300.name: Classic Racers - International Sponsoring - Donation DLC
1230300.description:
You want to make the bet and invest in the upcoming killer racing game. You want to see it in ESport events ! Make a big donation and officialy sponsor its development ! This game will be the next worldwide reference !

This DLC is a donation from you without counterpart from the developer. This DLC does not include any additional content, feature, special event or reward. It will does not affect or add content to your game's directories. The game will still be the same even if you do not purchase this DLC. Its only purpose is to help the creator of the free game "Classic Racers" to continue the development.
1230300.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
